      • compareJobs

        public boolean compareJobs(java.lang.String inputFilename,
                           java.lang.String outputFilename)
        Compares two JSON files.
        Parameters:
        inputFilename - the full path name of the input JSON file.
        outputFilename - the full path name of the output JSON file.
        Returns:
        true, if the two JSON objects are equal, or false, otherwise.
